page.title: 08Education - Mattingley Area.
page.content: Some children attend private or board- ing schools outside the area.{There {are no state schools}within the block so children have to travel some distance by private car, school bus or train. If the children live over 3 miles from the school the transport costs are paid by the County Council. 5-11year olds in the north & west of the block attend{Whitewater C/E {Primary School at Rotherwick}(some of these formerly attended Heckfield School which closed in 1984). Children in the south-east corner of the block attend{Oakwood Infants or Greenfields {Junior Schools at Hartley Wintney. At 11, those receiving state education go mainly to{Robert Mays {Comprehensive School at Odiham}(some go to Yateley). The nearest Sixth Form College is{Queen Mary's School in {Basingstoke.
